text: Albert Almoznino (; March 3, 1923 – April 7, 2020) was a Moroccan-born Israeli hand shadow artist. His career began in 1958. He became well known in the 1960s, when he performed his hand shadow skills at Radio City Music Hall in New York, Paris Olympia and during the The Ed Sullivan Show. Almoznino was born in Mogador (Essaouira), Morocco. Almoznino died on April 7, 2020 at the age of 97.אמן הצלליות ממרוקו שכבש את ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Israeli artists Category:Israeli Jews Category:Jewish artists Category:Moroccan Jews Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel
title: Albert Almoznino
